titles.title: Expressing support for the Iranian people's continuing protests, fundamental human rights, and the desire for a democratic, secular, and non-nuclear republic in Iran.
Expressing support for the Iranian people's continuing protests, fundamental human rights, and the desire for a democratic, secular, and non-nuclear republic in Iran.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
Supports the people of Iran's legitimate and peaceful protests against the Iranian regime.
Condemns the Iranian regime's human rights abuses against the Iranian people.
